group_1.textRight: Senpai! @Should I put this stuff into here?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, please.
Ah![chara:300301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
You idiot!@What are you doing?!
Don't I always tell you to be careful @when you're carrying chemicals!!

group_1.textRight: Geeze...@...Ya don't have to get so mad...

group_1.textLeft: Uh...
You're right...@Sorry...
I had a bad experience with dangerous@chemicals a long time ago...
So I'm really careful with them now...

group_1.textRight: Really? Like for real? C'mon!@Lemme hear the "Legend of Miyako"!

group_1.textLeft: Don't give it a weird name...

group_1.textRight: Dangerous? Like how dangerous?@Like super-duper dangerous?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, super-duper dangerous.
Anyhow, that's how I became a Magical Girl.
If I hadn't met Kyubey then...
I probably would have died.

group_1.textRight: So how did it happen?!@Some kind of accident?!

group_1.textLeft: ...No, I just got what I deserved.
I was messing around with a dangerous@experiment to make toxic gas.

group_1.textRight: Geeze...@Why were you doing somethin' like that?

group_1.textLeft: Well... @I was just a kid...
I was being careless...
The more dangerous something was, @the more curious I was about it...

group_1.textRight: Senpai, like I had no idea @you were such a bad girl!

group_1.textLeft: Bad girl, huh...

group_1.textRight: But what happened?@You don't do crazy stuff like that now.

group_1.textLeft: I stopped a long time ago.
I grew up and I learned how to judge@situations much better.

group_1.textRight: Too bad your body didn't grow much, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Wha?!@[freeze:0.5][chara:300301:motion_200][chara:300301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300301:cheek_2]Shut your mouth!
